channel.title: Advertisements
channel.description:
This is just a reminder that there are to be [size=12pt][b][u]NO[/u][/b][/size] server/forum advertisements at all on MoparScape. Lately there have been tons of server/forum advertisement topics, and these need to stop. There is a [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php][b]Server Status Page[/b][/url] for a reason. If you are posting a link to a forum, don't bother, it will only give you a punishment.
If you are posting it on the forums because you are having an error that your server is "offline," [b]that means you are doing something wrong[/b], in which case you should visit [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,200036.0.html][b]this topic[/b][/url]. All topics advertising servers will be removed [b]without[/b] warning.
Thank you for your cooperation,
The MoparScape.org Staff

item.title: Advertisements
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

This is just a reminder that there are to be [size=12pt]NO[/size] server/forum advertisements at all on MoparScape. Lately there have been tons of server/forum advertisement topics, and these need to stop. There is a Server Status Page for a reason. If you are posting a link to a forum, don’t bother, it will only give you a punishment.

If you are posting it on the forums because you are having an error that your server is “offline,” that means you are doing something wrong, in which case you should visit this topic. All topics advertising servers will be removed without warning.

Thank you for your cooperation,

The MoparScape.org Staff

Read full topic
